body.description: Amazon Basics Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 and E is a creamy, non-greasy, moisturizing body lotion that helps soothe and protect normal to very dry skin types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped with my dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to treat some extra dry skin I had on back of my hands and elbows. This has helped them tremendously, and the skin there now feels perfectly fine. The lotion goes on easily and doesn't leave any greasy residue. The smell is not overpowering and it helped moisturize my skin within only a few applications. Only needed to use a tiny amount each time, so this will last me a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and Not Greasy!
reviews.reviewText: I have always been a loyal shea butter/cocoa butter lotion kinda girl, but this was at such a great price I figured I would try it out and see how it compares. It is lightweight, non greasy, smells very pleasant, and hydrates just as well as what I have always used. A little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, questionable packaging
reviews.reviewText: The lotion feels hydrating and it smells pretty good. The feeling of hydration does not last too long if your hands are dry. However the tape on the lotion had a hair stuck to it? Not pleasant to see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped my dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion I had it shipped to my sisters house where I was going to vacation for two weeks over thanksgiving and I wanted something cheap. It’s cheap but I didn’t realize I was getting a great product. It’s not oily and leaves your skin feeling soft. I was sad to leave it behind, so when I got back home I ordered another bottle. It reminds me of Curel fragrance free lotion but just a little thicker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wish I had discovered this sooner!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great lotion. My skin absorbs this like it was a sponge! I wish I had discovered this sooner! It would have saved me from buying a lot of lotions that don't do as they claim! This lotion is wonderful. It really does absorb quickly and completely. My skin feels soft and looks younger for over a day after applying! It has a very subtle scent and doesn't clash with your perfume. It would work equally for men too. My husband tried it and loves how it made his skin feel.I'm really glad I found this. Seeing as it's a generic I wasn't sure - you know how that works. But so far Amazon Basic products have really impressed me and I plan on ordering more! BTW it even feels great on my face!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Greasy residue after applying
reviews.reviewText: It's not bad, has an okay scent, but it leaves a greasy, oily residue on your hands after applying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizers at much less the cost
reviews.reviewText: I like that it moisturizes my skin it’s comparable to another name brand and the price is good, better than the name brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, I clean for a living and spend a lot of time cooking and doing dishes by hand. So naturally I wash my hands A LOT! I've wasted so much money on lotions. I started to believe they don't work, OR I was doing something wrong. This lotion does have a slight oily residue, which holds moisture in. I will have to wait a few minutes to touch anything (under 5 mins). I've noticed after a few days my hands are way better. If you're conflicted but need strong lotion, this is it. If you need something less heavy duty, look elsewhere. This is for working hands that are under attack constantly or severly dry skin. At A STEAL OF A PRICE TOO!
